about.description: The objective of the UXPH Research team is to leverage existing industry-academe connection in gaining better understanding of the UX landscape in the PH Context. This can be a potential income-generating activity and a training ground for those who want to engage in research.

objectives.objective: contribute to the body of knowledge towards the better understanding of the UX and HCI landscape in the Philippines
work its partners in the collection of data, design of experiments that are ethical and scientifically-sound
share and make its findings accessible to the PH context towards a more data-driven design-mature UX Strategy landscape
provide an avenue for young and budding researchers to take part in research activities
actively find, secure and procure funding, equipment and other resources that helps in the research process
